summary: This mod will make the sound of the Nirnroot either quieter or muted.
descriptionHtml:
Another file in the Muffle Series I bring you Muffle The Nirnroot. For all of you out there that just cringe everytime you pass by a nirnroot this file should help you. Or to the one who wants more of a challenge collecting them. This comes in 2 flavors, Muffle The Nirnroot - Quiet and Muffle The Nirnroot - Mute. Choose only one.



[color=yellow]Check Out My Other Mods[/color]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/15567]Stop The Dark Brotherhood Forever Quest From Returning[/url]
